name.baseName: Aluminum ingot casting ; Primary aluminum ingot ; Liquid primary aluminum ; 2017
铝锭铸造 ; 原生铝锭 ; 液态原铝 ; 2017年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The primary aluminum ingot casting process described in this data set is utilized in the production of high-purity aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum. These aluminum ingots are essential in various industries for their superior conductive properties and are commonly employed in the manufacture of electrical components, construction materials, and transportation vehicles.
本数据集描述的原生铝锭铸造工艺用于从液态原铝生产高纯度铝锭。这些铝锭在多个行业中非常重要，因为它们具有优越的导电性能，通常用于制造电气元件、建筑材料和运输车辆。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The primary aluminum ingot casting process described in this data set is utilized in the production of high-purity aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum. These aluminum ingots are essential in various industries for their superior conductive properties and are commonly employed in the manufacture of electrical components, construction materials, and transportation vehicles.
本数据集描述的原生铝锭铸造工艺用于从液态原铝生产高纯度铝锭。这些铝锭在多个行业中非常重要，因为它们具有优越的导电性能，通常用于制造电气元件、建筑材料和运输车辆。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This data set primarily provides LCA data for researchers and industrial practitioners focusing on the environmental impact of the aluminum production process. Users should take into account that the primary aluminum (PA) data are based on statistical sources, secondary aluminum (SA) data are drawn from literature, and the background data are derived from the CAS RCEES 2018, a Chinese localized LCA database. When applying this data, attention should be paid to methodological choices such as system boundaries, inclusion or exclusion of recycling processes in assessment, and region-specific environmental impacts. The technological applicability of this data is current as of 2017 and users should verify the relevance of the data against current standards and practices.

该数据集主要为研究人员和工业实践者提供了关注铝生产过程环境影响的LCA数据。用户应考虑到原生铝（PA）数据基于统计来源，再生铝（SA）数据来源于文献，背景数据来自中国本土化的LCA数据库CAS RCEES 2018。应用这些数据时，应注意到方法论选择，例如系统边界的界定、评估中循环再利用过程的包含或排除，以及区域特定的环境影响。此数据的技术适用性截至2017年，用户应验证数据与当前标准和实践的相关性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
